resources.string: Your emergency contacts will be notified via SMS that you are in danger

If you get into trouble beacuse of a dishonest taxi driver, you can use Taxi Heat to notify your friends and family of your situation.

If you press the "help" button during your journey, we will send a text message and your approximate location to your emergency contact.

Taxi Heat has got your back.
Lock the doors,\nClose the windows,\nStay alert!

Thanks for using Taxi Heat! See you again next time!
